name: eleq12i
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3

stmt.origin: bitri(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c0, c3))
stmt.pretty: bitri(c0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ c3, c0 ∈ c3)

body.origin:
|- wb(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3))
-| wb(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, c3))
-| wb(wcel(c0, c3), wcel(c2, c3))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3))
-| wb(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, c3))
-| wb(wcel(c0, c3), wcel(c2, c3))

body.origin:
|- wb(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, c3))
-| wceq(c1, c3)

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3))
-| wb(wcel(c0, c3), wcel(c2, c3))
-| wceq(c1, c3)

body.origin:
|- wb(wcel(c0, c3), wcel(c2, c3))
-| wceq(c0, c2)

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3))
-| wceq(c1, c3)
-| wceq(c0, c2)

comment: Inference from equality to equivalence of membership. (Contributed by NM, 31-May-1994.)
